meanings.definition: An attack in which incendiary devices are used to set fire to a target.
meanings.sent1: The firebombing destroyed the entire building.
meanings.sent2: The city suffered a devastating firebombing during the war.
meanings.sent3: The firefighters practiced putting out imaginary firebombings.
meanings.sent4: The firebombing of ideas ignited a revolution in the minds of the people.
meanings.sent5: The aftermath of the firebombing left a trail of destruction and ashes.

meanings.definition: The act of bombing a target with incendiary devices to cause fires.
meanings.sent1: The firebombing caused chaos and panic among the civilians.
meanings.sent2: The military planned a strategic firebombing campaign.
meanings.sent3: The chef's cooking was so bad, it felt like a taste firebombing.
meanings.sent4: The firebombing of criticism left him emotionally scorched.
meanings.sent5: The firebombing of colors in the sky painted a breathtaking scene.
